Personalized Outreach.title: Craft Personalized Outreach Messages
Personalized Outreach.description: Create compelling, psychology-backed outreach messages that build genuine connections with passive candidates without immediately mentioning job opportunities.
Personalized Outreach.content: Act as an expert in candidate engagement using psychology and neuroscience. Craft 3 versions of an outreach message for a senior software engineer from Georgia Tech who has led open-source projects and mentors junior developers. Use relevant humor, spark curiosity without mentioning a job, and end with a compelling call to action.

Personalized Outreach.title: Generate Engaging Subject Lines
Personalized Outreach.description: Create attention-grabbing email subject lines that stand out in crowded inboxes and intrigue passive candidates to open your message.
Personalized Outreach.content: Generate 10 subject lines that stand out in an inbox, tailored for an AI/ML expert with research in computer vision. Each should include a single emoji and intrigue someone who isn't actively job searching.

Personalized Outreach.title: Rewrite Outreach Message Tone
Personalized Outreach.description: Transform formal recruitment messages into casual, friendly communications that focus on career growth rather than job specifications.
Personalized Outreach.content: Rewrite this outreach message to incorporate a casual, friendly tone while emphasizing career aspirations rather than job details. Keep it concise and engaging.

Personalized Outreach.title: Create a Follow-Up Message
Personalized Outreach.description: Develop strategic follow-up messages that add new value and maintain candidate interest without appearing pushy or desperate.
Personalized Outreach.content: Create a follow-up message for a passive candidate who hasn't responded yet. Add a new value point and a light touch of humor to maintain engagement without sounding pushy.

Referral Strategies.title: Create Referral Narratives from Transcripts
Referral Strategies.description: Extract powerful quotes and stories from conversations to create authentic referral narratives that showcase company culture and mission.
Referral Strategies.content: Review this conversation transcript and extract the most impactful quotes about our engineering team's culture and mission. Convert them into 2-3 concise narratives for referral outreach.

Referral Strategies.title: Generate Referral Request Email
Referral Strategies.description: Build referral request templates that emphasize storytelling and career advancement opportunities rather than financial incentives.
Referral Strategies.content: Generate an email template to request employee referrals, emphasizing storytelling and the opportunity to help others advance their careers rather than financial incentives.

Referral Strategies.title: Identify Referral Generation Spaces
Referral Strategies.description: Discover where your ideal candidates gather online and offline, with tailored messaging strategies for each community or event.
Referral Strategies.content: Using our 'Tech Enthusiast' persona, identify industry events, professional groups, and online communities where our ideal candidates are active. Provide messaging ideas to engage in these spaces and generate referrals.

Referral Strategies.title: Craft a Referral Request Follow-Up
Referral Strategies.description: Convert timing mismatches into referral opportunities by maintaining relationships and making it easy for candidates to recommend others.
Referral Strategies.content: Create a follow-up message to a candidate who liked the opportunity but the timing wasn't right. Reference our previous discussion, transition naturally into a referral request, and make it easy for them to say yes.

Pre-Screening Process.title: Generate Screening Questions
Pre-Screening Process.description: Create comprehensive screening questions that assess both technical competencies and cultural fit based on specific job requirements.
Pre-Screening Process.content: Using the attached job description and hiring manager notes, generate a set of behavioral and technical screening questions that assess key role competencies and culture fit.

Pre-Screening Process.title: Develop a Scoring Rubric
Pre-Screening Process.description: Build structured evaluation frameworks that standardize candidate assessment and ensure consistent screening quality across interviews.
Pre-Screening Process.content: Develop a structured scoring rubric for pre-screening responses, outlining what constitutes strong, adequate, and concerning answers.

Pre-Screening Process.title: Provide Sample Responses
Pre-Screening Process.description: Generate example candidate responses at different qualification levels to help interviewers better calibrate their evaluation standards.
Pre-Screening Process.content: Provide sample responses at three levels—highly qualified, moderately qualified, and underqualified—based on these screening questions.

Pre-Screening Process.title: Analyze Transcripts for Success Predictors
Pre-Screening Process.description: Identify patterns in interview responses that correlate with successful hires to continuously improve your screening process effectiveness.
Pre-Screening Process.content: Analyze recent pre-screening interview transcripts and identify patterns in responses that indicate strong predictors of success. Recommend adjustments to screening questions based on insights.

Pre-Screening Process.title: Modify Screening Questions for Collaboration
Pre-Screening Process.description: Adapt technical screening questions to emphasize collaborative problem-solving skills while maintaining rigorous technical assessment standards.
Pre-Screening Process.content: Modify these screening questions to emphasize collaborative problem-solving while maintaining technical assessment components, ensuring alignment with our team's culture.
